Safely extract an attribute from a named list

Source: R/utils.R
attr_safe_get.Rd

Safely extract an attribute from a named list

Usage

attr_safe_get(attrs, name, default = NA_character_)

Arguments

attrs

Named list (e.g., xml2::xml_attrs() result)

name

Attribute to retrieve

default

Fallback value

Value

Scalar character
